images.copyright: American bison, Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming (© Gary Gray/Getty Images)
images.title: Built for the cold
images.caption: National Bison Day
images.desc: When temperatures plunge, the American bison couldn't care less. These burly mammals are ready for snow with their shaggy coats and massive bodies weighing up to 2,000 pounds. Our homepage bison are pictured in Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming, home to one of the largest and oldest herds in the country. Bison have roamed here since prehistoric times.
